name: The Settlers 2: The Next Generation - The Vikings
name_original: The Settlers 2: The Next Generation - The Vikings
description:
The Settlers 2: The Next Generation - The Vikings is a strategy game developed by Funatics Studio Alpha. It was originally released in 2007. Ubisoft Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play The Settlers 2: The Next Generation - The Vikings on PC.
